agent_utterance: Tonight’s ultra-simple plan: 1) Hydrate with one tall glass of water or unsweetened iced tea and pause for 60 seconds. 2) Do a brief 2-minute wind-down (gentle stretch or slow walk around the room). 3) Quick log: after dinner, did you have a snack? If yes, note the snack and rate your craving on a 0-10 scale. If no snack, give yourself a quick ‘done’ note. 4) If cravings arise at bedtime, choose one tiny, satisfying option (e.g., one small piece of fruit or a small handful of almonds) and keep it to a single portion. 5) Tomorrow, set a simple one-line plan: 'Post-dinner log + 2-minute wind-down.'
